text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.title: Realistic Sleep mod config
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.da: The message that will be displayed to all players on the action bar after sleeping through the night.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.se: Toggles the "x/y players are sleeping through this night (time until dawn: z)" message on the actionbar.
Send not enough players sleeping message?
Toggles the "x/y players are currently sleeping. z/w players are required to sleep through the night." message on the actionbar.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.sl: The curve which is used to determine the multiplier of the speed of the night as time progresses.
How many times faster the night should go.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.bl: How many times faster block entities like furnaces should tick.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.ch: How many times faster chunks should tick. There's a reason this is disabled by default, enable at your own risk. Insane TPS loss is guaranteed.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.ra: How many times faster raid timers should tick .
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.en: How many times faster entities should tick.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.ti: Adds an amount of ticks delay to every tick, so time goes slower.
realisticsleep.text.not_enough_players_s: %d/%d players are currently sleeping. %d/%d players are required to sleep through the %s
